text: In the new DM, when you create a flexible column inside a template and include a rich text module, the module is able to become "Smart" when editing the page. However, if you add additional rich text modules inside that flexible column, they cannot be made "smart". This seems like a issue as I thought all rich text modules can be made smart?
Hey <@U2H3TT8F2> I can't reproduce this from the template or the page editor. Can you DM me a link?
That first rich text module was added in the old DM, when we did display the "make smart" option in the blue toolbar in the page editor. New modules only have this in the sidebar.

Hello! I would like to set up a form to automatically send a follow-up email after it is submitted. I've read the documentation below, but I cannot find the "Post submit actions" anywhere. Can someone help me solve this? thanks <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/articles/kcs_article/workflows/how-can-i-send-an-email-response-after-a-form-submission>
